price: Hakika wao ndio waharibifu, lakini hawatambui.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Enyi Waumini! Amkeni, mtanabahi, muwatambue kuwa hao ndio mafisadi wa kweli, lakini wenyewe hawautambui ufisadi wao kwa ajili ya ghururi walio nayo, wala hawaitambui adhabu kali watakayo ipata kwa unaafiki wao huu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
